summary: This patch focuses on CI/DevOps improvements and bug fixes‚Äîthere are no user-facing or API changes.

primary_section.title: CI/DevOps Improvements
features: **Enhanced release notes generation** with improved version handling and AI processing
**Simplified template processing** by removing version dependencies from AI responses
**Improved error handling** in GitHub Actions workflows for better reliability

secondary_sections.title: Bug Fixes
features: **Fixed version mismatch issues** in automated release notes generation
**Resolved template variable processing** for consistent output formatting

bug_fixes: **Fixed version mismatch** in release notes generation causing validation failures
**Resolved template processing** issues with version handling
**Fixed AI prompt consistency** between local and GitHub Actions environments
ci_improvements: **Enhanced AI processing pipeline** with better version handling and reduced dependencies
**Improved template variable system** supporting both JSON and legacy formats
**Streamlined release workflow** with more reliable version management
